segments.text: Recently I have been getting headache and my eyes don't seems to see focus properly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did you last time have your eyes checked ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Two years ago . At that time I had no problems.Now I can ’ t even make out something ten meters away .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Come over here . I will test your eyes . First cover your left eye like this , and when I point , please read the chart from the top , and go as far as you can , telling me which way the “ E ” points .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never mind , just read as far as you can .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can only read the first three lines .
segments.speaker: S1
